银团贷款(syndicated loan)是国际金融市场上比较成熟的一种业务模式,通常指两家或两家以上的银行,依据同样的贷款条件,并使用共同的贷款协议,向借款人发放并由一家.

entry.tran: 辛迪加;私人联合会;企业联合组织
entry.def: A syndicate is an association of people or organizations that is formed for business purposes or in order to carry out a project.

example.ex: They formed a syndicate to buy the car in which they competed in the race.
example.tran: 他们合伙买下了他们参加赛车时用的那部车。

entry.tran: 把(新闻或电视节目)同时出售给多家媒体(供其发表或播放)
entry.def: When newspaper articles or television programmes are syndicated, they are sold to several different newspapers or television stations, who then publish the articles or broadcast the programmes.

example.ex: Today his programme is syndicated to 500 stations...
example.tran: 今天他的节目将在 500 多家电视台播出。

example.ex: Myssi is well known in Finland for her quirky food column, which is syndicated across the country.
example.tran: 迈茜以其怪趣的食品专栏闻名芬兰，该专栏在全国多家报纸均有刊登。

entry.def: A press syndicate is a group of newspapers or magazines that are all owned by the same person or company.

means.word_mean: 1. organizing into or administering as a syndicate
2. selling (an article or cartoon) for publication in many magazines or newspapers at the same time;

sentences.sentence: "he received a comfortable income from the syndication of his work"
